title: Sampler, ca. 1810
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross and stem stitches on plain weave foundation
inscribed:
S.R. Waters
Sarah Russell Waters, Boston, Massachusetts
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Donor's Notes: "Bought in Exeter about 1904."
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Four alphabets and two sets of numerals, in horizontal bands separated by narrow cross borders, with the inscription "S.R. Waters" near the top, and "Sarah Russell Waters, Boston, Massachusetts" at the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross and stem stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1976-100-57.
